trans-unit.source: Represents a user or user-group for granting access to rights managed content.
trans-unit.target: Representa um usuário ou grupo de usuários para conceder acesso a conteúdo gerenciado de direitos.

trans-unit.source: As with other <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement> types, ContentUser is only usable in full trust applications.
trans-unit.target: Assim como com outros <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement>tipos, ContentUser só é útil em aplicativos de confiança total.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The user or group `name` is often in the form of an individual e-mail address (such as johndoe@contoso.com) or an e-mail distribution list (such as marketing@contoso.com).
trans-unit.target: O usuário ou grupo `name` costuma ser na forma de um endereço de email individuais (como johndoe@contoso.com) ou uma lista de distribuição de email (como marketing@contoso.com).

trans-unit.source: The user or group name.
trans-unit.target: O nome de usuário ou grupo.

trans-unit.source: The method for authentication.
trans-unit.target: O método de autenticação.

trans-unit.source: Gets an instance of the "Anyone" <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser"></xref> persona.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma instância de "Qualquer" <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser"> </xref> persona.

trans-unit.source: AnyoneUser has <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.AuthenticationType%2A> "Internal" and <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.Name%2A> "Anyone".
trans-unit.target: AnyoneUser tem <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.AuthenticationType%2A>"Interno" e <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.Name%2A>"Todos".</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.Name%2A> </xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.AuthenticationType%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.AuthenticationType%2A> "Internal" with <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.Name%2A> "Anyone" is granted rights during publishing, the authentication server will issue a <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense> to any request and will attach the license to the requesting user.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.AuthenticationType%2A>"Interno" com <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.Name%2A>"Todos" receber direitos durante a publicação, o servidor de autenticação emitirá um <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense>a qualquer solicitação e anexará a licença do usuário solicitante.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense> </xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.Name%2A> </xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.AuthenticationType%2A>

trans-unit.source: An instance of the "Anyone" <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser"></xref> persona.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância de "Qualquer" <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser"> </xref> persona.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.AuthenticationType"></xref> specified to the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.AuthenticationType"> </xref> especificado para o <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.%23ctor%2A> construtor.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.AuthenticationType"></xref> specified to the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.AuthenticationType"> </xref> especificado para o <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.%23ctor%2A> construtor.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether this <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser"></xref> is equivalent to another given instance.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um valor que indica se este <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser"> </xref> é equivalente a outro determinada instância.

trans-unit.source: The user instance to compare for equality.
trans-unit.target: A instância de usuário para comparação de igualdade.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.Name*> and <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.AuthenticationType*> are the same for both this user and the given user; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se <> </> *> e <> </> *> são os mesmos para esse usuário e o usuário especificado; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a computed hash code based on the user <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.Name*> and <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.AuthenticationType*>.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um código de hash calculado com base no usuário <> </> *> e <> </> *>.

trans-unit.source: A hash code computed from the user <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.Name*> and <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.AuthenticationType*>.
trans-unit.target: Um código hash computado do usuário <> </> *> e <> </> *>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the user is currently authenticated.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um valor que indica se o usuário é autenticado no momento.

trans-unit.source: The given user <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.Name%2A> is authenticated based on the given <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.AuthenticationType%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O usuário <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.Name%2A>é autenticado com base em determinado <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.AuthenticationType%2A>.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.AuthenticationType%2A> </xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: After a user has been authenticated and IsAuthenticated is `true`, the user dialog and prompt to confirm authentication is no longer displayed when creating a <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment>.
trans-unit.target: Depois que um usuário foi autenticado e IsAuthenticated é `true`, caixa de diálogo de usuário e solicita confirmação de autenticação não será mais exibida durante a criação de um <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment>.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user is currently authenticated; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o usuário é autenticado no momento; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> until authenticated.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> até autenticado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the user or group name specified to the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome de usuário ou grupo especificado para o <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.%23ctor%2A> construtor.

trans-unit.source: The user or group name specified to the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: O nome de usuário ou grupo especificado para o <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.%23ctor%2A> construtor.

trans-unit.source: Gets an instance of the "Owner" <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser"></xref> persona.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma instância de "Proprietário" <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser"> </xref> persona.

trans-unit.source: OwnerUser has <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.AuthenticationType%2A> "Internal" and <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.Name%2A> "Owner".
trans-unit.target: OwnerUser tem <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.AuthenticationType%2A>"Interno" e <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.Name%2A>"Proprietário".</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.Name%2A> </xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser.AuthenticationType%2A>

trans-unit.source: OwnerUser is used by the server-side templates to give special rights to the content author or publisher when the protected document is created.
trans-unit.target: OwnerUser é usado pelos modelos do lado do servidor para dar direitos especiais para o autor do conteúdo ou publicador quando o documento protegido é criado.

trans-unit.source: An instance of the "Owner" <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser"></xref> persona.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância de "Proprietário" <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser"> </xref> persona.
